Room.Name: East Tower Stairway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the eastern tower stairwell which winds around the large tower.
Room.LongDescription: This tower seems to be endless in in height. At least the stairwell seems to go forever. Every time you take a step, either up or down, it seems as though you have not moved at all. The stairwell smells of mildew and wood rot. However, there is a wonderful smell of perfume coming from above.
